name: False Awakening | Episode 1
description:
Synopsis:

'False Awakening' is a dark, story-focused, psychological game, about a young man who is stuck in his dream, and is unable to wake up from it.

Details:
  • Title: False Awakening | Episode 1
  • Subtitle: Episode 1: "Am I... in a dream?"
  • Playtime: 20 - 30 minutes.
  • Genre: Story-focused, dark, psychological.
  • Game Engine: RPG Maker MV
  • Play Mechanic:  You just walk from one place to the next, interact, and have dialogue. (No battle system, no choices. This game is a 'linear' experience.)
  • Extra Note: Wet dreams.   (ಠ ͜ʖ ಠ) 
System Requirement:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • RAM: 4 GB
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 940MX (Or equivalent)
  • Directx: Version 9
  • Storage: 250 MB Available space
  • Controls Support: You need either a Keyboard, or Mouse, or Gamepad. (Everything works. Gamepad may need some tweaking.)
  • Extra Note: If this game doesn't run on your PC... then trust me, it hurts me, more than it hurts you. (╥﹏╥)
Credits:
